content.rendered:
Loveshoot in the forest

Just before their wedding took place, Lianne and David booked a loveshoot in the forest. Not just a forest, but an old one in the middle of The Netherlands. A loveshoot is a photoshoot in casual (chic) clothes in a beautiful location of your choice. This shoot is highly recommended because it’s “just” fun to have nice pictures of yourself. They are just as special as the photos of wedding photography.
And if you are nervous about having your picture taken at your wedding, it helps you a lot. Shooting with me is all about having fun and movement, not posing. I promise you will like it, 100%!

“Once a year, my husband will do a loveshoot with me. Though, I have to make a promise for that”

As a professional photographer, I hear it often. Couples who say they have little or no beautiful photos of them together. Very unfortunate and not necessary at all. Because a beautiful love shoot is easily booked and it’s also a lot of fun to experience. By the way, did you know that my husband will shoot with me just once a year? Although, I have to promise that the rest of the year I will no longer “nag” if he wants to be photographed. Okay, deal!

It may be a bit exaggerated for some people, but I think it’s very valuable to have beautiful photos of us together. When we are old and wrinkled we can proudly look back at those photos. Maybe with a smile or a tear, but always filled with beautiful memories. Because shooting is also very fun to do if you book the right photographer ;-).

“What Lianne and David thought of their love shoot“

This is what Lianne and David thought of their love shoot in the forest:
“We booked a love shoot with Stefano before our wedding. Especially on the big day, we were very happy that we did that. After all, we now knew exactly what to expect from the shoot and that gave a lot of relaxation. We sometimes find it a bit uncomfortable when photos are taken of us, but Stefano knew how to handle this perfectly”.

“The photos are so much more beautiful then we expected”

“Angela is a professional photographer, but she also creates a fun and relaxed atmosphere. We also enjoyed having nice photos of our “save the date” and the wedding card. When we saw the results, we both looked at all the photos in amazement. They were so much more beautiful than we expected”.

“Photographer for your loveshoot in the forest”

Tip: do you want a loveshoot in the forest with your partner, boyfriend or girlfriend? Or maybe you would like to book a love shoot in another great location? Let me know and I will be happy to think along with you. Get some inspiration by watching the shoot of Lianne and David.

Extra tip: Do you want to see a wedding in the forest? I have 1 online for you HERE.

SWITCH TO ITALIAN
